message.name: ERR_BANKBRANCH_XRV_CANCELLED_BANK
message.locale: The branch cannot be inserted as the selected bank is canceled.
The branch cannot be inserted as the selected bank is cancelled.

message.name: ERR_BANKBRANCH_XRV_AT_LEAST_ONE_ACTIVE_ACCOUNT
message.locale: You cannot cancel the bank branch "%1s" because it contains active accounts.

message.name: ERR_BANKBRANCH_XRV_CLOSED_BANK
message.locale: The branch cannot be inserted as the selected bank is closed.

message.name: ERR_BANKBRANCH_XRV_BANK_CLOSED_NOREOPEN
message.locale: The branch cannot be reopened as the bank "%1s" is closed.

message.name: ERR_BANKBRANCH_XFV_REOPENING_BANKBRANCH_REMOVE_END_DATE
message.locale: If you want to reopen this bank branch then you must remove the end date.
